name: SimonSays
0:
”Alexa open Simon Says.”
”Alexa launch Simon Says”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simon says
des:
Have fun playing Simon Says with Alexa!

Alexa will give you a command, but you should only follow the command if it begins with the words, "Simon says." The game goes for ten rounds. If you can make it all the way through without making a mistake, you win!

When playing this game, make sure you are standing up and have plenty of space around you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
